SELECT mapped.id, mnodeid, aname, name, target, val, ui_pairs FROM assetmapnode mapped, assettype types where types.id = mapped.type_id and mapped.mnodeid = #id#
SELECT mapped.id, aname, name, target, val FROM assetmapnode mapped, assettype types where types.id = mapped.type_id and mapped.mnodeid = #id#
SELECT count(id) from assetmapnode where id = #id#

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO assetmapnode ( id, mnodeid, type_id, name, target, val, ui_pairs ) VALUES ( #id#, #nodeid#, ( select id from assettype where aname = #type# ), #name#, #target#, #value#, '')
INSERT INTO assetmapnode ( id, mnodeid, type_id, name, target, val, ui_pairs ) VALUES ( #id#, #nodeid#, ( select id from assettype where aname = #type# ), #name#, #target#, #value#, #UIPairs# )
sqlMap.update: update assetmapnode set val = #value# where id = #id#
